briefdescription.para: Action function for ACAD BIG created.
Pack a set CIG parameters event.

parameterdescription.para: Number of CIS add or modified

briefdescription.para: Compute the maximum PDU transmission time in microseconds.

simplesect.para: This value includes preamble, access address, CRC and T_MSS.

briefdescription.para: Check if the create BIG parameters are valid or not.

simplesect.para: TRUE if parameter is valid, FALSE otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Check if the create BIG test parameters are valid or not.

simplesect.para: True if parameter is valid, False otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Set up a new BIG with test command.
Used by a broadcaster host to command is used to create one or more BISes of a BIG in the controller.
Used by a broadcaster host to command is used to create one or more BISes of a BIG in the ISO test mode.
